trans-unit.target: TEXT_SUBCTS828_04764_SEQ_00<tab>Thubyrgeim requires your help to put her theories to the proof.

TEXT_SUBCTS828_04764_SEQ_01<tab>Having heard of your research on the subject of scholars, and your newfound ability to summon a faerie familiar, Thubyrgeim hopes you might humor her with testing a theory. To that end she invites you downstairs to the guild's practice area.

TEXT_SUBCTS828_04764_SEQ_02<tab>Following Thubyrgeim's instructions, after a brief moment of concentration, you call forth your faerie familiar, but she has taken the form of a Topaz Carbuncle. Satisfied to see her theory proven, Thubyrgeim invites you back upstairs.
TEXT_SUBCTS828_04764_SEQ_03<tab>Thubyrgeim thanks you for the demonstration, encouraging you to make use of what you have learned.
TEXT_SUBCTS828_04764_TODO_00<tab>Wait at the designated location.
TEXT_SUBCTS828_04764_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Thubyrgeim.
TEXT_SUBCTS828_04764_THUBYRGEIM_000_001<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, how fortuitous. Might you spare a moment?
TEXT_SUBCTS828_04764_THUBYRGEIM_000_002<tab>I recently received word that you've been researching the scholars of Nym at the behest of a Marauders' Guild member, is that right?
TEXT_SUBCTS828_04764_THUBYRGEIM_000_003<tab>I see... And as a result, you can now call upon a faerie to aid you. Fascinating!
TEXT_SUBCTS828_04764_THUBYRGEIM_000_004<tab>Might I trouble you to meet me downstairs in the practice area? There's something I very much wish for you to try.
TEXT_SUBCTS828_04764_THUBYRGEIM_000_005<tab>Please wait for me downstairs. I will be along shortly.
TEXT_SUBCTS828_04764_THUBYRGEIM_000_010<tab>My apologies for the wait.
TEXT_SUBCTS828_04764_THUBYRGEIM_000_011<tab>My apologies for the wait. As for what I wish for you to attempt, it is a technique similar to what you've already employed with your egi.
TEXT_SUBCTS828_04764_THUBYRGEIM_000_012<tab>Now, would you be so kind as to call forth your faerie?
TEXT_SUBCTS828_04764_THUBYRGEIM_000_013<tab>How charming! The tales do little to capture its beauty.
TEXT_SUBCTS828_04764_THUBYRGEIM_000_014<tab>This faerie is no doubt manifested in the image of that which you most closely associate with faeries, but my research suggests this form is not immutable.

TEXT_SUBCTS828_04764_THUBYRGEIM_000_015<tab>Indeed, though a fundamental form may have been incorporated into the original incantation, with sufficient concentration, I believe it possible to supplant this form with the image of another entity. Try conjuring the faerie once more─this time, with a Carbuncle in your mind's eye.
TEXT_SUBCTS828_04764_THUBYRGEIM_000_016<tab>Remarkable! And with only a single attempt!
TEXT_SUBCTS828_04764_THUBYRGEIM_000_017<tab>'Twould seem my theory holds, meaning this transformation should be merely superficial, and has done naught to affect its capacity for healing. Very good.
TEXT_SUBCTS828_04764_THUBYRGEIM_000_018<tab>With that, we may conclude this little experiment. If you would follow me upstairs?
TEXT_SUBCTS828_04764_THUBYRGEIM_000_020<tab>Thank you again for your help, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. That proved to be quite the spectacle.
TEXT_SUBCTS828_04764_THUBYRGEIM_000_021<tab>I should hope you make use of what we've learned here today. I daresay your faerie's appearance may be without limit.
TEXT_SUBCTS828_04764_SYSTEM_000_022<tab>Your faerie's appearance can now be altered by using <var 48 F20222 /var><var 28 ((TextCommand)) 2209 /var><var 48 01 /var>.

TEXT_SUBCTS828_04764_SYSTEM_000_023<tab>For example, if you wish to change the appearance of Eos to appear as Ruby Carbuncle, use the text command <var 48 F20222 /var>/petglamour “eos” “ruby carbuncle”<var 48 01 /var>.
TEXT_SUBCTS828_04764_SYSTEM_000_024<tab>For further details, enter <var 48 F20222 /var>/? /petglamour<var 48 01 /var>.
